ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of ALICIA DAMLEY, director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, for the period she acted as Executive Director of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, commencing on August 1, 2020 and ending on September 29, 2020.
